changes.title: HTTP Main V4 API - Travel Rule
changes.description: Added new statuses DEPOSIT_TRAVEL_RULE_FROZEN (27) and DEPOSIT_TRAVEL_RULE_FROZEN_PROCESSING (28) to the deposit endpoint.

changes.title: HTTP Main V4 API - Birth Date Addition
changes.description: Added beneficiary.birthDate field (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) to withdrawal requests and customer.birthDate (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) to deposit requests.
